attributes.action: To let Mosque have their athan aloud within 50 meters around the area.
attributes.background: Many mosques would like these opportunities for the Islamic tradition as many haven't felt that feeling. we also accept the church bell and the synagog horn.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the decision whether or not to allow loudspeaker calls to prayer is one for local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
